name: Armored Blow
desc: You use your armor's guard to allow you to make a heavy strike.
reqs: Attached to a Melee Strike.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile and increase your _Guard_ by 2 against any _Punish_ attacks triggered by this Attack. As a part of this Attack, you may _Wager_ up to 3 _Grit_, contested by _Grit_/_Reflex_. If you win, deal additional Damage equal to the _Guard_ provided by your Armor, add _Prone_, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, even on a _Miss_.
special:
Gain an additional bonus, depending on the Strike's Keywords:
* _Quick_: Inflict _Push_ 2 instead of _Prone_.
* _Strong_: Add _Push_ 1, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: On a _Graze_- you may immediately make an Attack with an _Unarmed_ _Body_ Weapon.
* 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 this Turn.

name: Armored Charge
desc: You charge forward, trusting your armor to defend you.
reqs: Attached to a Technique with Movement.
effect: Add _Charge_ and increase your _Guard_ by 1 during this Movement.

name: Leap
desc: You leap forward, hurdling over hazards and other dangers.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: You may make a single _Jump_ this Turn.

name: Vault
desc: You make a mighty leap, covering more ground than most.
reqs: Technique has Movement and wearing Light or No Armor.
effect: You may _Jump_ this Turn. Increase your _Jump_ value by 1 this Turn.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Feint_ to the Attached Technique. If you _Jump_ through a creature's space this turn you have _Advantage_ on any Attack Roll against them this turn. The creature may pay 2 _Reflex_ to Negate this.

name: Parkour
desc: You use terrain to accelerate yourself, moving faster all the while.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: You may use the Effect of Free Run a single time during the Attached Technique and benefit from its Special effect.

name: Warding Blade
desc: You sacrifice the power of your strike to slip into a defensive stance, preparing for the opponent's next blow.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike using a Blade Weapon.
effect: Reduce the Damage of the Strike by 2, to a minimum of 1. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_ on a _Hit_ or 2 _Grit_/_Reflex_ on a _Crit_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Double the Tokens gained from the _Effect_. Add _Impaired_ 1 to a _Hit_ or _Impaired_ 2 to a _Crit_. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
special:
Gain an additional bonus, depending on the Strike's Keywords:
* _Quick_: Gain 1 _Reflex_. If the Weapon is _Light_, add _Safe_.
* _Strong_: _Gain 1 _Grit_. Instead, only reduce the Damage by 1. If the Weapon is _Heavy_, instead do not reduce the Damage.
* Other: This Technique instead has _Warding_ 2. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_.

name: Disruptive Bash
desc: Attacks with your shield leave foes reeling, limiting their ability to respond.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike using a Shield Weapon.
effect: Until the end of the Round, any _Impaired_ the creature has does not apply when the creature attacks you, but is treated as one higher (maximum of 4) when attacking other creatures.
special: If this Enhancement is used with a _Reaction_ that triggers off an Attack, you may immediately apply any _Impaired_ this attack inflicts to the Attack.

name: Strong Strike
desc: A powerful blow, sacrificing speed for power.
reqs: Technique is a Strike.
effect: Increase the _Speed_ of the Attached Technique by 1. Deal an additional 2 Damage if _Versatile_, or 3 if _Heavy_.
special: If the Technique targets multiple creatures, instead deal 1/2 additional Damage with _Versatile_/_Heavy_ Weapons.

name: Quick Strike
desc: A nimble attack, sacrificing power for speed.
reqs: Technique is a Strike.
effect: Decrease the _Speed_ of the Attached Technique by 1. Deal -2 Damage if _Versatile_.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll across the ground, slipping past foes.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: At any point in your Movement, you may declare that you are Tumbling. For the next X spaces, where X is your _Step_ value, add _Charge_, _Rush_, and _Safe_ 2 to your Movement.

name: Nimble Blade
desc: Your blade flashes out, providing you the path to retreat.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Blade Weapon with Movement.
effect: On a _Hit_+ with your Blade Weapon add _Safe_ 2. This _Safe_ applies only to the Targets of the Strike.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: You may take an additional _Step_ Movement, but it must be used after making your Attack.

name: Rending Slash
desc: A specialized blade technique that punishes unarmored foes.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Blade Weapon.
effect: If the Target has no _Guard_ or you target a Creature Part, either deal 2 additional Damage or inflict _Bleed_1x3.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: On a _Hit_+, add _Wounded_ 1 and increase the _Cost_ to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Spear Vault
desc: You plant your spear, using it as a pole vault to amplify your jump.
reqs: Technique has Movement and you are Wielding a Lance Weapon.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 1 + your Lance Weapon's _Reach_ this Turn for the first _Jump_ you make this Turn.

name: Harrying Thrust
desc: You use a spear strike to slip away from a foe, or grant an ally the same opportunity.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Lance Weapon.
effect: After resolving this Attack, you may take a _Step_ Movement. You must end this Movement as far from all Targets as possible. On a _Hit_+, add _Safe_ 2.
special: You may choose to take no Movement. If you do, an ally adjacent to the Target may pay 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ to _Step_ Move. Add _Safe_ 2 to this Movement on a _Hit_+.

name: Gouging Strike
desc: You make a vicious strike with a spear, wounding a foe.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Lance Weapon.
effect: Add _Wounded_ 1 and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. If the creature is already _Wounded_, deal additional Damage equal to their topmost _Wounded_ Token.

name: Lunging Strike
desc: You shift your grip back on your spear, extending your reach.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Lance Weapon.
effect: Increase your _Reach_ by 1 this _Turn_. Deal additional Damage equal to half the distance between you and the Target.
special: You may gain _Exposed_ 2 to instead increase your _Reach_ by 2.

name: Flurry of Blows
desc: You punctuate an unarmed strike with another unarmed strike.
reqs: Technique is a Strike making a single Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Instead, make two _Glancing_ Attacks using the same _Unarmed_ Weapon. If both are a _Hit_+, inflict Status again using the higher of the two Attacks.

name: Heavy Blow
desc: You strike true, focusing more on immediate damage than setting up another strike.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Inflict no _Vulnerable_ with this Attack. Instead, deal additional Damage equal to the _Vulnerable_ that would be inflicted + 1.

name: Combo Strike
desc: You take advantage of an advantageous position, preparing for the next strike.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: On a _Hit_+, gain 2 _Momentum_.

name: Severing Strike
desc: You outmaneuver a foe in an attempt to break their stance.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: On a _Hit_+, add _Break_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Staggering Strike
desc: A heavy blow that is almost certain to delay a foe.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: On a _Hit_+, add _Staggered_, _Push_ 2, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Spacing Strike
desc: You briefly utilize your ranged weapon as a melee one.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Artillery_ Weapon without _Glancing_.
effect: Before resolving your _Technique_, Attack with a Light, Medium or Heavy Improvised Weapon, depending on if the Weapon is Light, Versatile or Heavy. Add Push 1, and increase the cost to Negate by 1. Resolve the actual _Technique_, but add _Glancing_.

name: Deadeye Shot
desc: You take careful aim, threading your shot through cover.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Artillery_ Weapon.
effect: Gain _Hobbled_ 1. If the Target is at a lower _Elevation_, deal +2 Damage and ignore _Cover_.

name: Rapid Shot
desc: You quickly fire, sacrificing power for speed.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Artillery_ Weapon.
effect: Make three Attacks using your Weapon's Profile against the same Target. If all three are a _Hit_+, inflict _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Grit_).

name: Long Draw
desc: You set your feet, focusing more on power than mobility.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using an _Artillery_ Weapon.
effect: This Technique no longer has Movement. Deal +1 Damage.

name: Debilitating Throw
desc: Your thrown weapons have a habit of sticking, making things difficult for foes.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
effect: If this Strike _Embeds_, while the Target has _Embed_, they gain your choice of _Impaired_ 1 or _Exposed_ 1 at the start of each of their Turns (1 _Grit_ negates). The creature must put this Token at the top of their stack, unless the topmost value is higher.

name: Bounce Shot
desc: You ricochet your thrown weapons off a foe, sending it spiraling into another.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
effect: Increase the Range by 3 or choose an Obstacle within Range. Attack a creature within Range 4 of that Obstacle, but the new trajectory may not pass through the Obstacle.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Momentum_: On a _Hit_+, repeat the Attack but add _Glancing_ against a creature with Range 3 of the original Target. If the original Attack was _Glancing_, this Attack is made at _Disadvantage_.
* 3 _Momentum_: As above, but remove _Glancing_ and take no penalties if the original Attack was _Glancing_.

name: Invisible Throw
desc: Your thrown weapons come out at blinding speed, catching slower foes fully off-guard.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
effect: If the Target has not taken a _Turn_ yet this _Round_, deal an additional 2 Damage on a _Hit_+ if they do not _Negate_.

name: Close-Quarters Throw
desc: You throws do not compromise your defenses, allowing you to easily attack in close-quarters.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
effect: Ignore all penalties due to adjacent foes for this Attack. On a _Miss_, you may inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Driving Strikes
desc: Your blunt weapons forces foes back, keeping them off guard.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Blunt_ Weapon.
effect: Add _Push_ 1 on a _Graze_+, or _Push_ 2 on a _Hit_+. Increase to cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Sapping Strike
desc: Your weapon erode's a foe's ability to defend themself with every strike.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Blunt_ Weapon.
effect: On a _Hit_, you may force the Target to discard 1 _Defensive Token_ of your choice. On a _Crit_,  they instead discard 2. If they do not have sufficient Defensive Tokens they may discard other _Defensive Tokens_ of their choice. If they have no other _Defensive Tokens_, they instead take Damage equal to twice the Tokens they did not discard.

name: Breaking Strike
desc: You use your weapon to chip away at a foe's armor, finding an opening.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Blunt_ Weapon.
effect: If this Attack targets a creature's _Armor_, inflict _Dazed_ 1/_Exposed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on a _Hit_+.

name: Earthquake Step
desc: As you strike you send an earthquake to disrupt a foe's footing, limiting their ability to dodge.
reqs: Technique is a Strike.
effect: If the Target is within Range 4, before resolving the _Attack_, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Reflex_). If the Attack inflicts _Prone_, deal 1 additional Damage.
